title: Beer: Guide to the Most Common Beers and How to Combine Them
description:
This book will show you everything you ever wanted to know about beer from its history to how to find the perfect beer for any meal. It will introduce you to new beers and help you explore beers beyond the common big commercial light beers.

With this guide you will become a beer expert and always know the perfect beer for any occasion. You will discover the best ways to store and serve beer so that you get a tasty refreshing beverage every time. 

Inside you will learn: 

A brief history of beer
Surprising facts about beer
The best ways to store and serve beer
How to pair beer with food
The health benefits of beer
The differences between serving beer and wine
